slip 2 stitches 240 yds / 100g together as if to knit together knit 1 stitch from left needle pass slipped stitches over or app 200 yds dk weight yarn co cast on k knit sample shown in rosewood p purl pm place marker gauge round s round s ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise place 10 sts x 16 row = 2 on larger needles using them back onto your left needle then knit 2 stockinette stitch together through the back loop www autumnandindigo com pg 2 / raven dk directions brim with smaller needles using the german twisted cast-on co 88 100 112 pm and join to knit in the round being careful not to twist stitches ribbing *k1 p1 repeat * to end of round repeat previous round until brim measures 1 5 from co edge or about 10 rounds body change to larger needles round 1 *k3 p1 repeat * to end of round round 2 *p1 k1 p2 repeat * to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until hat measures appx 7 5 8 8 5 inches from cast on edge or until the body measures 1 inch less than desired length crown shaping round 1 *cdd p1 repeat * to end of round round 2-3 *k1 p1 repeat * to end of round round 4 *ssk repeat * to end of round break yarn leaving a 12 tail using darning needle pick up all remaining stitches remove needle and cinch closed weave the tail through the stitches one last time then tuck through to the wrong side weave in all remaining ends block as desired www autumnandindigo com pg 3 / raven dk
